cbinstall.description: Allows display of users forum posts from various forum extensions directly on users profile.

param.name: tab_posts_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging for posts.

param.name: tab_posts_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit for posts. Page limit determines how many posts are displayed per page.

param.name: tab_posts_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search for posts.

param.name: tab_posts_orderby
param.label: Order By
param.description: Select how to order the tab for posts.

param.name: tab_favs_display
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable usage of favorites on tab forums.

param.name: tab_favs_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging for favorites.

param.name: tab_favs_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit for favorites. Page limit determines how many favorites are displayed per page.

param.name: tab_favs_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search for favorites.

param.name: tab_favs_orderby
param.label: Order By
param.description: Select how to order the tab for favorites.

param.name: tab_subs_display
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable usage of subscriptions on tab forums.

param.name: tab_subs_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging for subscriptions.

param.name: tab_subs_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit for subscriptions. Page limit determines how many subscriptions are displayed per page.

param.name: tab_subs_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search for subscriptions.

param.name: tab_subs_orderby
param.label: Order By
param.description: Select how to order the tab for subscriptions.

param.name: forumStatus
param.label: Status
param.description: Select what forum status should be displayed.

param.name: forumRankTitle
param.label: Rank Title
param.description: Enable or disable display of Rank title.

param.name: forumRankImage
param.label: Rank Image
param.description: Enable or disable display of Rank image.

param.name: general_template
param.label: Template
param.description: Select template to be used for all of CB Forums. If template is incomplete then missing files will be used from the default template. Template files can be located at the following location: components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbforums/templates/.

param.name: general_class
param.label: Class
param.description: Optionally add a class suffix to surrounding DIV encasing all of CB Forums.

param.name: forum_model
param.label: Model
param.description: Select forum model usage. Model determines what forum extension to use. Select a specific model to enable model specific parameters.

param.name: k20_ordering
param.label: Ordering
param.description: Select CB field to synchronize model ordering from (values: 0 = Default, 1 = Oldest Post First, 2 = Newest Post First).

param.name: k20_viewtype
param.label: Viewtype
param.description: Select CB field to synchronize model viewtype from (values: flat = Flat View, threaded = Threaded View, indented = Indented View).

param.name: k20_signature

param.name: k20_listlimit
param.label: List Limit
param.description: Select CB field to synchronize model user list limit from (values: -2 = Default, -1 = All, 0 = Since Last Visit, 4 = 4 Hours, 8 = 8 Hours, 12 = 12 Hours, 24 = 24 Hours, 48 = 48 Hours, 168 = Week, 720 = Month, 8760 = Year).

param.name: k20_sidebar_reg
param.label: Registered
param.description: Input substitution supported sidebar display for registered users. Additional supported substitutions: [karmaplus], [karmaminus], [karmatitle], [karma], [rankimage], [ranktitle], [posts], [thankyou], [points], [medals], [personaltext].
